name: GHOSTkit
body:
### Welcome to GHOSTkit, the Geospace/Heliosphere Observation & Simulation Tool-kit

We are currently working on a preliminary build for release as a binary.  These binary files will be available on this page when they are ready.

### Current Status
- [x] LFM Reader
- [x] ENLIL Reader
- [x] CDAweb Toolkit
- [ ] Coordinate Transform Utility
- [ ] Space Craft Positions
- [ ] Closed Field Line filter
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
